entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as looking toward the front of the bus and seeing Hermione cover her eyes with her hands.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is described as covering her eyes with her hands on the bus.

entities.name: pigwidgeon
entities.description: Pigwidgeon is described as swaying happily on Hermione's shoulder.

entities.name: knight bus
entities.description: The Knight Bus is described as jumping from the Birmingham motorway to a quiet country lane and moving through various locations.

entities.name: stan
entities.description: Stan is described as swaying towards Harry and Ron on the bus.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is described as picking himself up from the floor for the sixth time due to the bus's movements.

relationships.description: Harry saw Hermione cover her eyes with her hands on the bus.
The Knight Bus jumped from the Birmingham motorway to a quiet country lane.
Stan swayed towards Harry on the bus.
Ron experienced motion sickness due to the bus's movements.
Stan informed Harry and Ron that they were approaching Hogwarts stop.
